html:
12.11.18  10:17 am   i want to film my life but i can't seem to make myself turn on a camera, it feels weird and nerve-wracking. any advice?

     you don't have to if you don't want to

12.11.18  9:42 am   aside from music and video editing, what else are you good at?

      bragging

12.11.18  9:13 am   12.10.18  3:44 pm ew why

     i can think of 3 reasons, actually 4. i am accustomed to unweighted keys, but i can also play much faster that way, also weighted keys make my cuticles bleed if i do a gliss, plus good luck carrying a weighted keyboard anywhere unless you have a tow truck. ew

12.11.18  9:07 am   What advice do you have on finishing incomplete projects? I've made a start on a lot of projects, but I tend to leave them behind when a more exciting idea comes along...

     try smaller projects. this will quickly give you more experience in every part of the procedure, including finishing. if this doesn't work, try even smaller projects

12.11.18  6:49 am   if a bunch of electrical neurons makes us conscious, then why shouldn't more electrical things be conscious, like a TV remote?

     it looks like there is something more to consciousness

12.11.18  3:15 am   I've always excelled through high school while never studying. Now that I am in college I find it incredibly hard to concentrate long enough to study efficiently any advice?

     the only way i can study anything is if it is exactly what i want to learn at that time, and if the study is completely and entirely self directed. it works very well for me that way, and does not work at all any other way

12.11.18  2:05 am   What;s your favorite anagram you've unscrambled?

     420

12.11.18  1:38 am   Are you fundamentally opposed to art that has the sole intent of making people feel like shit?

     i think so

12.11.18  1:30 am   long ago, did you consider going down the "Hollywood path" to further your career and dreams,

     for a few days i think

     or did you deteste what comes out of Hollywood to the point where you wanted to make it on your own steam without mainstream vulgarity and producers corrupting your art?

     no

12.11.18  12:40 am   how do you know when to compromise your dreams for practicality? 

     do it a little bit each day

12.11.18  12:32 am   The date next to How to win at spelling on your site is October 18, and there's a clip from it in Long long journey. Why did you wait a month to release it?

     didn't want to release it at all

      Were you saving it for an emergency, like missing your Tuesday deadline?

     yes

     Also, why do you choose to label videos like that one based on when they were complete and not when they were posted?

     makes more sense to me that way

12.10.18  11:25 pm   I want to start doing some things, be it learning an instrument, or programming, but I can't bring myself to do them, any suggestions/help?

     you don't have to do it

12.10.18  11:08 pm   Why do you dress like a guy wearing clothes

     why do you act like a person asking a question

12.10.18  10:48 pm   Do you believe in the stars?

     sure

12.10.18  10:03 pm   Have you ever had the issue of suddenly finding things you once were motivated to do lacking off all intrigue ? (Not Depressed) What did you do about it ? 

     i always remember the golden rule, interest never disappears, it only moves. like the motion of the solar system

12.10.18  9:38 pm   how do you write your songs?

     i must let them write me

12.10.18  9:33 pm   what is a good name for a chicken 

     My Chicken

12.10.18  9:19 pm   What can you tell about the song that's replacing the cancelled one?

     it's about a bad thing

      New or old?

     new

      Any breakthroughs in the t I' m e space continu u  u    u     um?

     yes and no

12.10.18  9:08 pm   What are your thoughts on the fact that the top 6 megacorporations control 90% of the mass media in the United States

     seems legit

12.10.18  8:28 pm   What's something you'd like to be better at?

     counting sheep

12.10.18  5:59 pm   do you think that the easter bunny is jesus christ's fursona ?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.10.18  5:50 pm   how do i get these damn spiders to stop biting me

     bite them back!

12.10.18  5:26 pm   What is your opinion on happiness?

     seems legit

12.10.18  4:33 pm   https://www.twitch.tv/billwurtz is this you?

     yes

12.10.18  4:06 pm   I really enjoy art, and I was wondering, whats your method to pick colour pallets?  

     colour palette

12.10.18  4:06 pm   Do any of your music have any backwards messages in them?

     no

12.10.18  3:58 pm   Hey Bill, I'm sorry for bothering you, i know your schedule is very strict, but I've been fascinated with your work for quite a while. On some days, your music is what helps me keep on going instead of just giving up. I've never wanted to talk to somebody nearly as much as i want to talk to you right now.
Anyways, did you think your music would have such a strong impact on your audience?  

     actually still hoping for stronger

12.10.18  3:57 pm   Do you enjoy being normal

     mildly

12.10.18  3:44 pm   which do you prefer , synth key action or weighted keys

     unweighted

12.10.18  2:40 pm   do you actively look for ideas or are ideas something you stumble upon accidentally during inner dialogue on busy times? 

     both

12.10.18  2:15 pm   best recent year for pop music? 

     any year is equally good. if 1 year looks better it is only an illusion

12.10.18  2:08 pm   Do you have any tips for someone looking to streamline their creative process? I've gotten into composition over the past year, and I think  my concepts have a lot of potential, but I'm having trouble managing my time and turning the concepts into finished products. Also, I have trouble deciding when a product is finished, and when there's nothing left to be done on it.

     it sounds like you need to do the 'small projects' trick. make very very small projects. you will learn everything you need to know about every stage of the process, because it will be much easier to move through them all, repeatedly. you will learn quickly this way. and if it's not working, make the projects even smaller, until it works

12.10.18  11:09 am   is there anyway to cure laziness

     the right task

12.10.18  10:58 am   it's really amazing how hardworking you are, i admire your work ethic and love your songs and videos. do you think that you will be creating different content or are you planning to keep doing what you're doing now?

     hopefully a little better and different, with some similarities mixed in

12.10.18  10:46 am   do you make videos and write songs because it makes you happy or because it makes other people happy? or does making other people happy make you happy?

     both and yes

12.10.18  10:34 am   how do you deal with fear?

     dance and sing lullabies with it

12.10.18  10:31 am   what do you think of rats as pets

     seems legit

12.10.18  10:03 am   What inspire you to make those complex harmonies and time signatures?

     it's like a bent mop. you will need to use it in specific situations where the floor is bent

12.10.18  9:42 am   Bill if you go to the videos sections of ur website the newest video there is Christmas Isn't Real, you need to put the newest video there

     that is the newest video

12.10.18  9:35 am   Is a video being released on Tuesday the 11th of December 2018?

     no but it should have been

12.10.18  8:46 am   would you like to live in a box

     not really

12.10.18  8:46 am   are your song titles/lyrics anagrams?

     no

      are your videos/songs linked to each other?

     no

      also i really liked some of the things you said in the podcast x

     oh that's very nice of you

12.10.18  8:30 am   how do I get as good as you?

     go deep into the wilderness, then go deep into the city. compare/contrast

12.10.18  8:27 am   will you ever put out an album

     i prefer to release songs individually

12.10.18  8:23 am   Do your shirts shop by us mail or by ups?

     i have no idea

12.10.18  8:19 am   Why do many pop singers twist their accents in songs? Does the style call for it?

     peer pressure i suppose

12.10.18  8:11 am   How do I be social?

     just like you already are

12.10.18  7:48 am   New song when? 

     at roughly the midpoint between now and december 25. forgive the unexactness, i am in re-hab here

12.10.18  7:33 am   are you still going to do the fake jail video

     probably

12.10.18  7:13 am   are you going to make a new very long project

     i would like to
